articles.title: American Airlines plane catches fire at DIA. 12 people sent to area hospitals with minor injuries - Colorado Public Radio
articles.description: The Boeing 737 was flying from Colorado Springs to Dallas Fort Worth when it was diverted to Denver International Airport.
articles.content:
Updated at 9:26 p.m. on March 13, 2025. 
An American Airlines jet caught fire on the tarmac at Denver International Airport late Thursday afternoon, producing heavy smoke around the plane.
